price: 26. »No adoréis más que a Al-lah, de lo contrario temo para vosotros el castigo de un día penoso».
arabic: أَن لَّا تَعۡبُدُوٓاْ إِلَّا ٱللَّهَۖ إِنِّيٓ أَخَافُ عَلَيۡكُمۡ عَذَابَ يَوۡمٍ أَلِيمٖ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: an lā taʿbudū illā al-laha innī akhāfu ʿalaykum ʿadhāba yawmin alīmin
